text: N falan naxanye sɛbɛxi ɛ benbane ma, n na e ramini waxatin naxan yi Misiran yamanani dɛnaxan luxi alo sulun tɛɛn11.4 Sulun tɛɛn mɔn falama yirena nde yi fa fala “Furu tɛɛna.” naxan wuren naxulunma.’ N na a fala nɛn e xa, n naxa, ‘Ɛ n xuiin namɛ, ɛ yi n ma yamarine birin suxu. Nayi, ɛ findima nɛn n ma yamaan na, n yi findi ɛ Ala ra.
